meanings.definition: Unrestrained by law or general morality; lawless; immoral.
meanings.sent1: The licentiousness behavior of the outlaws led to chaos in the town.
meanings.sent2: Her licentiousness actions shocked the conservative community.
meanings.sent3: The licentiousness puppy ran wild through the house, knocking over everything in its path.
meanings.sent4: The storm unleashed its licentiousness fury on the small coastal village.
meanings.sent5: The licentiousness disregard for rules and order resulted in a complete breakdown of society.

meanings.definition: Promiscuous and unprincipled in sexual matters.
meanings.sent1: The scandalous novel depicted a world of licentiousness relationships.
meanings.sent2: His reputation for licentiousness earned him a dubious reputation in town.
meanings.sent3: The licentiousness cat seemed to have a different partner every night.
meanings.sent4: The city's nightlife was a whirlwind of licentiousness encounters.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the dark side of licentiousness desires and their consequences.
